data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nelson, Wendy A. (2013): Pyropia plicata sp. nov. (Bangiales, Rhodophyta): naming a common intertidal alga from New Zealand. PhytoKeys 21: 17-28, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.21.4614, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.21.4614
